channel.title: Study-Techniques on Ctrl+Alt+Dark
channel.description: Recent content in Study-Techniques on Ctrl+Alt+Dark

item.title: Learning in the AI Era - Part 3: Practical Workflow with NotebookLM
item.author: james.northey@proton.me (Darkrym)
item.description: A hands-on guide to using NotebookLM for cybersecurity learning, including how to create study guides, generate flashcards, and build audio podcasts from technical documentation for active learning.

item.title: Learning in the AI Era - Part 2: The Learning Cycle
item.author: james.northey@proton.me (Darkrym)
item.description: Discover evidence-based learning frameworks including the three-phase Learning Cycle (Understanding, Remembering, Focusing) and how to adapt cybersecurity training to your personal learning style with AI.
